Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Starboard Ventures is an integral part of the Filecoin ecosystem, responsible for providing vital network analytics through our Network Health Dashboard (dashboard.starboard.ventures). The intent of this project is to onboard historical Filecoin data on Filecoin itself. The project serves two purposes: First, as a service to the Filecoin ecosystem (allowing the public to access historical data without incurring expensive extraction cost). Second, as a powerful demonstration of Filecoin's capabilities and a proof-of-concept for other blockchains.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Historical data of Filecoin as extracted from Lily. For schema, see https://lilium.sh
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: The data is prepared using Lily, a wrapped Lotus node, which processes raw blockchain data into structured datasets. For details of the tooling used, see lilium.sh.
